ITC-UClub Shuttle

Description:

The ITC-UClub Shuttle leaves campus and travels to the Innovative Technologies Complex (ITC) and UClub in University Plaza, while also making stops at Meadows, Hayes, and Washington Dr & Lehigh Av enroute back to campus.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
The ITC-UClub Shuttle runs from 7:30 A.M. until 9:30 P.M. on Weekdays.

After 9:30 P.M., please use the UClub Shuttle (UC) for service to/from UClub, Meadows, Hayes, Washington Dr & Lehigh Av, and Binghamton University.


Weekends:
The ITC-UClub Shuttle does not run on Weekends.

Please use the UClub Shuttle (UC) for service to/from UClub, Meadows, Hayes, Washington Dr & Lehigh Av, and Binghamton University.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of this route, its schedule, and its stops with links to stop pictures and Google Maps location pins so that you can easily find your stop, and know when your bus is expected to arrive.

There is no weekend service on the ITC-UClub Shuttle.


For weekend service to/from UClub, Meadows, or Hayes, please use the UClub Shuttle (UC).
